Name: Side Err
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
2.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: This apple delight combines apple brandy, Bison Grass vodka, cider (ideally Devonshire English cider) with a smoky whiff of Islay whisky.
History: Created in August 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Side Err contains 145 calories
